title: Russia asks Facebook how it complies with data law - Interfax
text:
April 12, 2018 / 2:48 PM / Updated 2 hours ago Russia asks Facebook how it complies with data law - Interfax Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian communications watchdog Roskomnadzor has asked Facebook to explain how it is complying with a Russian law on data localisation, the Interfax news agency reported on Thursday. A figurine is seen in front of the Facebook logo in this illustration taken, March 20, 2018. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/Illustration/Files 
Roskomnadzor has said earlier it would carry out an audit into Facebookâ€™s compliance with Russian legislation in the second half of 2018. Reporting by Jack Stubbs; writing by Maria Kiselyova; Editing by Alison Williams
